mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.equipment_location,a.equipment_name,a.equipment_numbert,a.equipment_type,a.first_responsible_person, b.account_type,b.asset_status,b.equipment_level,b.cost_center,b.equipment_class,b.purchase_date,b.maintenance_unit,b.property_unit,b.installation_unit,b.maintenance_user,b.equipment_grade FROM equip_me_basic_properties a LEFT JOIN equip_me_account b ON a.id = b.equipment_id WHERE 1=1 AND a.del_flag = 0 AND b.del_flag = 0

SELECT a.id,a.equipment_location,a.equipment_name,a.equipment_numbert,a.equipment_type,a.first_responsible_person, b.account_type,b.asset_status,b.equipment_level,b.cost_center,b.equipment_class,b.purchase_date,b.maintenance_unit,b.property_unit,b.installation_unit,b.maintenance_user,b.equipment_grade FROM equip_me_basic_properties a LEFT JOIN equip_me_account b ON a.id = b.equipment_id WHERE 1=1
AND ( a.equipment_location = #{condition.equipmentLocation} or a.upper_level = #{condition.equipmentLocation} )
AND a.equipment_type = #{condition.equipmentTypeLabel}
AND a.equipment_name like concat('%',#{condition.equipmentName},'%')
AND a.equipment_numbert = #{condition.equipmentNumbert}
AND a.first_responsible_person like concat('%',#{condition.firstResponsiblePerson},'%')
AND b.account_type like concat('%',#{condition.accountType},'%')
AND b.manufacturers like concat('%',#{condition.manufacturers},'%')
AND b.maintenance_user like concat('%',#{condition.maintenanceUser},'%')
AND a.del_flag = 0 AND b.del_flag = 0
